import './AddRecipes.css' import React from "react" const AddRecipes = (props) => { const nameRecipesRef = React.useRef(); const servingRef = React.useRef(); const imageUrlRef = React.useRef(); const newRecipeRef = (event) => { console.log(props) console.log(nameRecipesRef.current.value) console.log(servingRef.current.value) console.log(imageUrlRef.current.value) props.setNewRecipe(element => { return { ...element, name : nameRecipesRef.current.value, serving: servingRef.current.value, imageUrl: imageUrlRef.current.value } }) console.log(props.newRecipe) props.addRecipes(event) } return (
